***жарко.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жаркий.html>жа́рко</a> (3189)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаркий.html>жа́ркий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žárkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adverb"><a href = vnd.unilang:adverb.html>Adverb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаркий.html>жа́рко</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žárko</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl form-of lang-ru comparative-form-of origin-жа́рко" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)жа́рче</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>hotly</li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаркий.html>жа́рко</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žárko</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:short.html>short</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:neuter.html>neuter</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:singular.html>singular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаркий.html>жа́ркий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žárkij</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:ardent.html>ardent</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:hot.html>hot</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:torrid.html>torrid</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:hot.html>hot</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:heated.html>heated</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:sultry.html>sultry</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:жар.html>жа́р</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ко.html>ко</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:наречие.html>Наре́чие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>также</a> предикатив; неизменяемое. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — жарче.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жар-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-к-о</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

Анненский</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:второй.html>Втора́я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>книга</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отражение.html>отраже́ний</a>», <span class="example-date">1909</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;">предикатив</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:высокий.html>высо́кой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:температура.html>температу́ре</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:воздух.html>воздуха</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаркий.html>Жа́рко</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:лень.html>лень</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:цветущий.html>Цвету́щие</a> олеандры <a href = vnd.unilang:бросать.html>броса́ют</a> негустую <a href = vnd.unilang:тень.html>тень</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:столик.html>столики</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:открытый.html>откры́того</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кафе.html>кафе́</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%98%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80,_%D0%A4%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8C_%D0%90%D0%B1%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Искандер, Фазиль Абдулович">Ф. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. ***жаровня.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жаровня.html>жаро́вня</a> (20661)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жар.html>жар</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žar</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о́вня</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-óvnja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаровня.html>жаро́вня</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žaróvnja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаровня.html>жаро́вни</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаровня.html>жаро́вни</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаровня.html>жаро́вен</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:brazier.html>brazier</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:portable.html>portable</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:heater.html>heater</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>жа<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ров.html>ро́в</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ня</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 2*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жар-</b>; суффикс: <b>-овн</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-я</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***жарящий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жарить.html>жа́рящий</a> (7616)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жарить.html>жа́рящий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žárjaščij</span>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<ol><li><i>действ. прич. <a href = vnd.unilang:наст.html>наст</a>. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жарить.html>жа́рить</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***жатва.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́тва</a> (23554)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:east.html>East</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="orv">жѧтва</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žętva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*žętva</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*žęti</i> + |  <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*-tva</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:equivalent.html>Equivalent</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-тва</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-tva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́тва</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žátva</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́твы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́твы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́тв</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:harvest.html>harvest</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:process.html>process</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:harvest.html>harvesting</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:gather.html>gathering</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ripen.html>ripened</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:crop.html>crop</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:harvest.html>harvest</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:yield.html>yield</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:жатый.html>жа́т</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жа-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-т-в</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="сельскохозяйственное"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a>.-х.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:уборка.html>убо́рка</a>, срезание <a href = vnd.unilang:злак.html>зла́ков</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:серп.html>серпа́ми</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:коса.html>ко́сами</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:машина.html>маши́нами</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:пойти.html>Пойду́т</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́тва</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́твой</a></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рожь.html>ро́жью</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пшеница.html>пшени́ца</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:за.html>за</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ячмень.html>ячменём</a> овёс, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тут.html>тут</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> дёрганье <a href = vnd.unilang:конопля.html>конопли́</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%93%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%8C,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%92%D0%B0%D1%81%D0%B8%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Гоголь, Николай Васильевич">Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. Гоголь</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:мертвый.html>Мёртвые</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:душа.html>души</a>», <span class="example-date">1842</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мя</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уборка.html>убо́рки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлебов</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:сжатый.html>сжа́тые</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеба</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:урожай.html>урожа́й</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:пшеница.html>Пшени́ца</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:расти.html>росла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:рост.html>рост</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́ка</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:рожь.html>рожь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> яровые <a href = vnd.unilang:хлеб.html>хлеба</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:давать.html>дава́ли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:всегда.html>всегда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обильный.html>оби́льную</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́тву</a></span>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%91%D1%83%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD,_%D0%A4%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%B9_%D0%92%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Булгарин, Фаддей Венедиктович">Ф. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. </p>

***жать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a> (7091)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*žęti</i>; <a href = vnd.unilang:cognate.html>cognate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">жѧти</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žęti</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, 1sg. <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">жьмѫ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žĭmǫ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>

</p>

<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">выжимка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vyžimka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жим</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žim</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жом</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žom</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жмых.html>жмых</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žmyx</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:зажим.html>зажи́м</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">zažím</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:нажим.html>нажи́м</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nažím</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">обжимка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">obžimka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">отжим</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">otžim</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">пережим</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">perežim</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*žęti</i>; <a href = vnd.unilang:cognate.html>cognate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">жѧти</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žęti</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, 1sg. <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">жьнѭ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="cu-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žĭnjǫ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žatʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сжать.html>сжать</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пожать.html>пожа́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:reap.html>reap</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:crop.html>crop</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:посеять.html>посе́ешь</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:пожать.html>пожнёшь</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">što poséješʹ, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> <b>požnjóšʹ</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sow.html>sow</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:so.html>so</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:shall.html>shall</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:reap.html>reap</a></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h5>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жнейка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žnejka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жнец</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žnec</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́тва</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žátva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жатка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žatka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 14b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́лы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:сжать.html>сжать</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:пожать.html>пожа́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жа-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>. <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:давить.html>дави́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:сдавливать.html>сда́вливать</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:сжимать.html>сжима́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:стискивать.html>сти́скивать</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:давить.html>дави́ть</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:давить.html>дави́ть</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:давить.html>дави́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:выдавливать.html>выда́вливать</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:выжимать.html>выжима́ть</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:притеснять.html>притесня́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:угнетать.html>угнета́ть</a></li>
<li>разг.: <a href = vnd.unilang:поджимать.html>поджима́ть</a></li>
<li>разг.: <a href = vnd.unilang:гнать.html>гнать</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 14b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:сжать.html>сжать</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жа-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

<ol><li>сжинать, <a href = vnd.unilang:пожинать.html>пожина́ть</a>, скашивать</li></ol>

***жаться.html

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žatʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:press.html>press</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:squeeze.html>squeeze</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:жаться.html>жми́сь</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:брать.html>бери́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хотеть.html>хо́чешь</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a> <b>žmisʹ</b>, berí što xóčešʹ</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:don.html>don</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:stint.html>stint</a> yourself; <a href = vnd.unilang:take.html>take</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:want.html>want</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:passive.html>passive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žatʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:press.html>press</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:squeeze.html>squeeze</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>
<dl><dd><span class="nyms perfective"><span class="defdate">Perfectives:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сжаться.html>сжа́ться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">sžátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">пожа́ться</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">požátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></dd></dl></li></ol>

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žatʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:reap.html>reap</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жаться.html>жа́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žátʹsja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сжаться.html>сжа́ться</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">пожа́ться</b>)
</p>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жнейка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žnejka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жнец</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žnec</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жатва.html>жа́тва</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žátva</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жатка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žatka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>жа́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ться</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 14b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:сжимать.html>сжима́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жа-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>

<p><b>жа́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ться</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 14b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — сжинать.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жа-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жахнуть.html>жа́хнуть</a> (26837)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>жа́х<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>нуть</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 3a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — жахать.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жах-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ну</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="просторечное"><a href = vnd.unilang:простой.html>прост</a>.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:резко.html>ре́зко</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:открытый.html>откры́то</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:напрямик.html>напрями́к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сказать.html>сказа́ть</a> кому-либо что-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:неожиданный.html>неожи́данное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:заранее.html>зара́нее</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обдуманный.html>обду́манное</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:выпалить.html>вы́палить</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:ну.html>Ну</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тут.html>тут</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:жахнуть.html>жа́хнул</a></span>: «<a href = vnd.unilang:философия.html>Филосо́фия</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говорю́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:один.html>одно́</a> пустобрехство <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наводка.html>наводка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тень.html>теней</a>.» <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9E%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8%D0%B9,_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B9_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Островский, Николай Алексеевич">Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Островский</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>Как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:закаляться.html>закаля́лась</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сталь.html>сталь</a>», <span class="example-date">1930—1934</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="просторечное"><a href = vnd.unilang:простой.html>прост</a>.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:быстро.html>бы́стро</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выпить.html>вы́пить</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:жахнуть.html>Жа́хнув</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пяток.html>пятку</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кружка.html>кру́жек</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чай.html>ча́ю</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:подмигнуть.html>подмигну́в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:друг.html>друг</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дружок.html>дружке</a>, сельдюки <a href = vnd.unilang:подвести.html>подвели́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:итог.html>ито́г</a>: — <a href = vnd.unilang:ну.html>Ну</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:слава.html>сла́ва</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бог.html>бо́гу</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:маленько.html>мале́нько</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:закусить.html>закуси́ли</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%90%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B0%D1%84%D1%8C%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%92%D0%B8%D0%BA%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80_%D0%9F%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Астафьев, Виктор Петрович"><a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. <head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жбан.html>жбан</a> (20963)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

</p>
<ol><li>(<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:large.html>large</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:can.html>can</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:pitcher.html>pitcher</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***жвачка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жвачка.html>жва́чка</a> (13531)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жвачка.html>жва́чка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žváčka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жвачка.html>жва́чки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жвачка.html>жва́чки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жвачка.html>жва́чек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:rumination.html>rumination</a>, chewing</li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:cud.html>cud</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:chewing-gum.html>chewing-gum</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">жвачный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">žvačnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жевать.html>жева́ть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ževátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>жва́ч<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жв-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ач-к</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><i>частичн.</i>: тягомотина</li>

</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1b  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:жгут.html>жгута́ми</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:охранявший.html>охраня́вшими</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>его́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:непогода.html>непого́ды</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Семен Данилюк, «<a href = vnd.unilang:рублевый.html>Рублёвая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зона.html>зо́на</a>», <span class="example-date">2004</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; <li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="медицинское"><a href = vnd.unilang:мед.html>мед</a>.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:эластичный.html>эласти́чная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:резиновый.html>рези́новая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трубка.html>тру́бка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бинт.html>бинт</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> перетягивания <a href = vnd.unilang:конечность.html>коне́чности</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:цель.html>це́лью</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:временный.html>вре́менной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:остановка.html>остано́вки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кровотечение.html>кровотече́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:укол.html>уко́лах</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вена.html>ве́ну</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнать.html>Узна́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:помочь.html>по́мочь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:утопающий.html>утопа́ющему</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:наложить.html>наложи́ть</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***жгучий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жгучий.html>жгу́чий</a> (7208)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">жг-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žg-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-у́чий</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-účij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жгучий.html>жгу́чий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žgúčij</span>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:жечь.html>жгу́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чий</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жг-</b>; суффикс: <b>-уч</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***жгущий.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:жгущий.html>жгу́щий</a> (5386)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жгущий.html>жгу́щий</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">žgúščij</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:жечь.html>жечь</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">žečʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:жечь.html>жгу́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>щий</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:действительный.html>Действи́тельное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:причастие.html>прича́стие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:настоящий.html>настоя́щего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:время.html>вре́мени</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жг-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ущ</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ий</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><i>действ. прич. <a href = vnd.unilang:наст.html>наст</a>. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жечь.html>жечь</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***ждать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ждать.html>ждать</a> (202)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*žьdati</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:wait.html>wait</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:await.html>await</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Balto-Slavic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Balto-Slavic language">Proto-Balto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-bsl-pro">*<a href = vnd.unilang:g.html>g</a>(<a href = vnd.unilang:e.html>e</a>)id-</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*gʰidʰ-</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_High_German" class="extiw" title="w:Old High German"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:high.html>High</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="goh">gīt</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:avarice.html>avarice</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Prussian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Old Prussian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:prussian.html>Prussian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="prg">gēide</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:they.html>they</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:wait.html>waiting</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="cite_note-1"> | 1 | </a></sup>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ждать.html>ждать</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">ždatʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:подождать.html>подожда́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:wait.html>wait</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:wait.html>wait</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> (<i>+ <a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:case.html>case</a></i>)
<ul><li><div class="citation-whole"><span class="cited-source"><b>1955</b>,  <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vladimir_Nabokov" class="extiw" title="w:Vladimir Nabokov">Vladimir Nabokov</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:chapter.html>chapter</a> 14, <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a>  <cite>Lolita</cite>:</span><dl><dd><div class="h-quotation"><span class="Cyrl e-quotation" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:решённый.html>решено́</a> Лолиту <a href = vnd.unilang:отправить.html>отпра́вить</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:туда.html>туда́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ближайший.html>ближа́йший</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:четверг.html>четве́рг</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:вместо.html>вме́сто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>того́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чтобы.html>что́бы</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ждать.html>ждать</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:июль.html>ию́ля</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бы́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:намеченный.html>наме́чен</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сначала.html>снача́ла</a>.</span><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Rešenó Lolitu otprávitʹ tudá že <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> bližájšij četvérg. Vmésto tovó, štóby <b>ždatʹ</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:do.html>do</a> ijúlja, kak býlo naméčen snačála.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation">Lolita, <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:decided.html>decided</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:will.html>would</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:send.html>sent</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:there.html>there</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:thursday.html>Thursday</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:instead.html>instead</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:wait.html>waiting</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:until.html>untiĺ</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:july.html>July</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:initially.html>initially</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:planned.html>planned</a>.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></div></li></ul>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ждать.html>Ждать</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:конец.html>конца́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:война.html>войны́</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Ždatʹ</b> koncá vojný.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>To</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:wait.html>wait</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:end.html>end</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:war.html>war</a>.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:expect.html>expect</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:await.html>await</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ожидание.html>ожида́ние</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ožidánije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:ждать.html>ждать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 6°b/CX.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:подождать.html>подожда́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-жд-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

***же.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> (27)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*že</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Balto-Slavic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Balto-Slavic language">Proto-Balto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-bsl-pro">*<a href = vnd.unilang:ge.html>ge</a></i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*ǵʰi</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:cognate.html>Cognate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Czech_language" class="extiw" title="w:Czech language"><a href = vnd.unilang:czech.html>Czech</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="cs">že</i>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek"><a href = vnd.unilang:ancient.html>Ancient</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a></a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">γε</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ge.html>ge</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sanskrit" class="extiw" title="w:Sanskrit"><a href = vnd.unilang:sanskrit.html>Sanskrit</a></a></span> <i class="Deva mention" lang="sa">हि</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="sa-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:hi.html>hi</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction"><a href = vnd.unilang:conjunction.html>Conjunction</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">že</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">contrasting</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:whereas.html>whereas</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">он—америка́нец, <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>она́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сская</a>.</i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">On—amerikánec, oná <b>že</b> rússkaja.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>He</a>’<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:american.html>American</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:whereas.html>whereas</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:she.html>she</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a>.</span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle"><a href = vnd.unilang:particle.html>Particle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">že</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="use-with-mention">Emphasises <a href = vnd.unilang:identity.html>identity</a></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:very.html>very</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:same.html>same</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>тако́й</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> (<a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>са́мый</a>)</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">takój <b>že</b> (sámyj)</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:same.html>same</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:similar.html>similar</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Я</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:купить.html>купи́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:такой.html>таку́ю</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>кни́гу</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ja.html>Ja</a> kupíl takúju <b>že</b> knígu.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>I</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:buy.html>bought</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:same.html>same</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:book.html>book</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>тот</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> (<a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>са́мый</a>)</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:tot.html>tot</a> <b>že</b> (sámyj)</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:same.html>same</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:identical.html>identical</a></span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>тот</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b>!</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>On</a> vsjó <a href = vnd.unilang:tot.html>tot</a> <b>že</b>!</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>He</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:always.html>always</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:same.html>same</a></b>!</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>са́мое</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Éto tó <b>že</b> sámoje.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>It</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:same.html>same</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:thing.html>thing</a>.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>With</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:expression.html>expressions</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:time.html>time</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:order.html>order</a>: emphasises <a href = vnd.unilang:promptitude.html>promptitude</a></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:very.html>very</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:right.html>right</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:immediately.html>immediately</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:without.html>without</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:delay.html>delay</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:первый.html>пе́рвой</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:страница.html>страни́це</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>была́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ошибка.html>оши́бка</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:na.html>Na</a> pérvoj <b>že</b> straníce bylá ošíbka.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:right.html>Right</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:first.html>first</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:page.html>page</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:there.html>there</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:mistake.html>mistake</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:следовать.html>сле́дующий</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:день.html>день</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:работа.html>рабо́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>была́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:готовый.html>гото́ва</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:na.html>Na</a> slédujuščij <b>že</b> denʹ rabóta bylá gotóva.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:very.html>very</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:next.html>next</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:day.html>day</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:work.html>work</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:finished.html>finished</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:прекратить.html>прекрати́те</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сейчас.html>сейча́с</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b>!</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Prekratíte sejčás <b>že</b>!</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:stop.html>Stop</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:immediately.html>immediately</a></b>!</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:после.html>После</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ужин.html>у́жина</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>она́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сразу.html>сра́зу</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:лечь.html>легла́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:спать.html>спать</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Posle úžina oná srázu <b>že</b> leglá spatʹ.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:after.html>After</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dinner.html>dinner</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:she.html>she</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:go.html>went</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:straight.html>straight</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:bed.html>bed</a>.</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:make.html>Makes</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:objection.html>objection</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:point.html>pointing</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:obvious.html>obvious</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fact.html>fact</a></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:after.html>after</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:почему.html>почему́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>вы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>понима́ете</a>? <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>Э́то</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сский</a>!</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Počemú vy <a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a> ponimájete? Eto <b>že</b> rússkij!</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:why.html>Why</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:don.html>don</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:understand.html>understand</a>? <b><a href = vnd.unilang:after.html>After</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:all.html>all</a></b>, <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a>’<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a>!</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">-Я <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:знать.html>зна́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:завтра.html>за́втра</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:экзамен.html>экза́мен</a>. -Я <b><a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>тебе́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сказать.html>сказа́л</a>!</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">-Ja <a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a> znal, što závtra ekzámen. -Ja <b>že</b> tebé skazál!</i> ― <span class="e-translation">-I didn'<a href = vnd.unilang:t.html>t</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:know.html>know</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:exam.html>exam</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tomorrow.html>tomorrow</a>. -<b><a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>But</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>I</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:tell.html>told</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a>!</span></div></dd></dl></li>
